name: Spork's Most Unstable Week of the Month
name_original: Spork's Most Unstable Week of the Month
description:
** Download and/or play fullscreen for the best experience! **

Oh no! It's the week of the Godot Wild Jam! Take care of the apartment and play a variety of minigames as you help Spork get through the most unstable week of the month!

Controls:

  • WASD / arrows / left stick / d-pad = move
  • shift / l-trigger / r-trigger = toggle run
  • space / E / button 0 = interact
  • escape = pause

Credits

  • 2d art - https://kenney.nl/
  • 3d art - https://kenney.nl/
  • audio - https://www.zapsplat.com/, https://freesound.org/, https://freepd.com/
  • special thanks - llxu, thebdk, #1sl, jig, jaffui, lucalizandnick
